content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #149

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: In the sentence "FHIR Patient resource describing the patient whose chart is currently in context.." Should it be the patient which chart was closed?

Type: A-S Correction

Comment: In the sentence "FHIR Patient resource describing the patient whose chart is currently in context..".

Should it be the patient which chart was closed?

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
